seller_info.seller_name: Sold by Vroom - Get It Delivered Nationwide, Contact-Free
seller_info.seller_notes: Vroom is a national online retailer that allows you to shop thousands of high-quality vehicles online, delivered straight to you. With Vroom, browse through an extensive inventory of low-mileage, competitively priced cars and trucks, with easy online financing and new inventory added every day. Have a car to trade-in? Vroom offers hassle-free, no obligation quotes, and they will even pick your vehicle up. Vroom only sells cars and trucks with clean titles, that are free of fire, flood and frame damage and have accident-free CARFAX vehicle history reports at the time of purchase and sale. Every Vroom vehicle must also pass safety, mechanical and cosmetic inspections before it is sold. If a vehicle does not meet Vroom's retail standards, they do not list the vehicle for sale on the site.

seller_info.seller_name: Sold by Patriot Hyundai of El Monte
seller_info.seller_notes: Looking for a clean, well-cared for 2019 Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD? This is it. Your buying risks are reduced thanks to a CARFAX BuyBack Guarantee. Pull up in the vehicle and the valet will want to parked on the front row. This Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD High Country is the vehicle others dream to own. Don't miss your chance to make it your new ride. Take home this Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD High Country, and you will have the power of 4WD. It's a great feature when you need to drive over tricky terrain or through inclement weather. This 2019 Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD has such low mileage it has been parked more than driven. Enjoy the drive without worrying about directions thanks to the built-in navigation system. Marked by excellent quality and features with unmistakable refined leather interior that added value and class to the Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD High Country. Patriot Hyundai of El Monte in El Monte, CA treats the needs of each individual customer with paramount concern. We know that you have high expectations, and as your car dealer, we enjoy the challenge of meeting and exceeding those standards each and every time. Allow us to demonstrate our commitment to excellence!
